data.name: ctseg
data.description: A segment picture impurity solver with spin-spin interactions.

evidence: "TRIQS segment picture solver (CTSEG)" and "This application is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it" â€“ described as an application/solver, indicating end-user research software rather than a library.

The project is a "segment picture solver" supported by the Flatiron Institute (Center for Computational Quantum Physics), implying it is used directly for scientific computations and research results.

README only links to documentation and installation instructions on triqs.github.io and shows a GitHub Actions build badge, with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying distribution primarily via the source repository.
